title: Medical Oxygen Manifold System
description: Centralized oxygen supply system for hospitals, ensuring consistent pressure and flow. Available in automatic and semi-automatic models.

title: Oxygen Control Panel
description: Precision control panel for managing oxygen flow and pressure within medical gas pipeline systems. Ensures safe and efficient gas delivery.

title: Manifold NRV
description: Non-Return Valve (NRV) designed for oxygen manifolds, preventing backflow and maintaining unidirectional gas flow in medical gas systems.

title: SS Flexible Tail Pipe
description: Stainless steel flexible tail pipe designed for secure and adaptable connections within medical gas systems. Ensures leak-proof gas transfer.

title: IOX Regulator Kit
description: Inlet Oxygen Regulator Kit provides precise control of oxygen pressure from cylinders, part of medical gas regulation apparatus.

title: Oxygen Outlet Point
description: Wall-mounted oxygen outlet point providing a secure connection for oxygen delivery devices, essential for patient respiratory support.

title: Vacuum Outlet Point
description: Wall-mounted vacuum outlet point for connecting suction devices, critical for removing fluids and maintaining a sterile environment.

title: CO2 Outlet Point
description: Carbon dioxide outlet point designed for precise gas delivery in medical applications. Ensures controlled CO2 supply and regulation.

title: N2O_Outlet_Point
description: Nitrous oxide outlet point providing a safe and secure connection for N2O delivery in medical and dental settings.

title: Air Outlet Point
description: Compressed air outlet point providing a reliable source of medical-grade air for respiratory and surgical applications.

title: Ward Vacuum Unit
description: Mobile vacuum unit designed for versatile suction. Efficient fluid removal in hospital wards equipped with reliable pump.

title: Copper Pipe
description: Medical-grade copper pipe ensures safe and reliable transport of medical gases. Conforms to safety standards for medical facilities.

title: Valve
description: High-quality brass valve for precise control of fluid flow in medical applications. Durable construction suited for sterile environments.

title: Oxygen + Vacuum Alarming Systems
description: Alarm system to monitor oxygen and vacuum levels in hospital pipelines. Ensures quick response to maintain patient safety.

title: Oxygen + Nitrous Failure Alarm
description: Critical alarm system to detect failures in oxygen and nitrous oxide supplies, immediately alerting staff to potential hazards.

title: Oxygen Flowmeter
description: Flowmeter for precise adjustment and monitoring of oxygen delivery. Critical for respiratory therapy, provides accurate readings.

title: Monitor Tray
description: Durable tray designed to securely hold patient monitoring devices. Ensures equipment is accessible and organized in clinical settings.

title: ICU Bedhead Panel
description: Integrated panel providing easy access to medical gases, electrical outlets, and nurse call systems. Improves accessibility within ICU.

title: Vacuum Pump 5HP
description: High-powered vacuum pump to maintain effective suction in medical facilities. Robust design for continuous operations in hospitals.

title: Air Compressor
description: Oil-Free air compressor to supply clean and dry air for medical applications. Designed to meet standards for purity and reliability.

title: Air Pump V255 5HP
description: High-capacity air pump delivering oil-free compressed air. Vital for ventilators, anaesthesia machines, and other respiratory devices.

title: Air Dryer
description: Essential to remove moisture for reliable operation of oxygen and medical air systems. Protects equipment and maintains air quality.

title: De-Humidifier
description: Used in conjunction with compressed systems to remove humidity improving component life and function of air driven equipment.

title: Oxygen Point Nose Block
description: Medical-grade nose block to facilitate oxygen administration. Comfortable and effective for patients requiring respiratory support.

title: OT Table
description: Advanced operation theatre tables suitable for various surgical procedures. Available in Matrix Model, Automatic, and C-arm compatible variants.

title: Gynae OT Table (Electric)
description: Specialized electric table designed for gynecological and obstetrical procedures. Offers superior positioning and control for surgeons.

title: Arm Rest with SS Clamp
description: Stainless steel arm rest with clamp to enhance stability and support during operations. Adjustable to suit patient needs.

title: Lithotomy Bracket
description: Lithotomy bracket helps positioning of the lower extremities during urological and gynaecological procedures to allow optimal access.

title: OT Mattress
description: Pressure-relieving mattress for operating tables. Decreases pressure points and ensures patient comfort during lengthy procedures.

title: OT Leg Support
description: Adjustable leg support designed to provide stability during surgical procedures. Ensures patient comfort and reduces muscle strain.

title: Yellphine Attachment
description: Specialized attachment for surgical tables. Offers enhanced positioning capabilities during complex surgical procedures.

title: OT Safety Belt
description: Safety belt designed to secure patients on the operating table. Prevents movement during procedures and enhances overall safety.

title: OT Electrical Control Panel
description: Centralized control for all electrical functions in the operating theatre. Streamlines operation and improves efficiency.

title: OT LED Light
description: High-intensity LED light. Provides enhanced visibility with minimal heat output. Double Dome, Single Dome, and CT-5 variants available.

title: Casualty LED Light
description: Mobile LED light for emergency rooms. Excellent mobility for quick setup, offers intense, white light to ensure clear conditions.

title: Examination Light
description: Examination light designed for clinics and examination rooms. Easy to adjust and provides directed lighting for accurate vision.

title: Portable Spotlight
description: Spotlight mobile for various medical settings providing focused illumination. Lightweight with an adjustable head.

title: OT Light SMPS
description: Switched-mode power supply designed for stability to give consistent performance. Provides safe, reliable power to lighting in OR.

title: OT Light Handle
description: Sterilizable parts for surgical lights. Enables hassle-free light adjustment during operations without compromising sterility.

title: OT Light Focus Controller
description: Focus control unit for surgical light, adjustment during operations to give optimal light for surgeons without contamination.

title: OT Light Control Panel
description: Control panel for management of surgical light systems. Integrated intensity setting modes designed for ease of management.

title: OT Light SS Bush + Connector
description: Parts for reliable connections of OT lighting setup, improves system stability in theaters, allows for smooth attachment.

title: OT Light Panel Connector
description: Panel connectors maintain integrity of panel setup in operation rooms, provides enhanced safety and protection.

title: Horizontal Cylindrical Autoclave
description: Available models for efficient sterilization in surgical centers, reliable and easy to control, robust sterilizer system.

title: Vertical Autoclave
description: Autoclave to sterilize lab equipment, ideal size easy to load and simple vertical design.

title: Autoclave Drum
description: Drum for carrying components to be sterilized, essential to ensure sterilization is managed within a controlled environment.

title: ETO Sterilizer
description: Uses ETO to sterilize equipment to protect from contamination from biological agents.

title: ETO Gas Cartridge
description: Cartridge component for sterilizers using ethylene oxide, ensures the function of the machine and appropriate sterilization.

title: Sealing Machine
description: Essential for ensuring medical instruments are packed according to protocols.

title: Autoclave Thermal Paper Roll
description: Records the sterilization process inside autoclave, confirms that the machine went to certain temperatures, to record proper sterilization.

title: ICU Bed
description: Available in manual and electric and multiple function configurations. Built for robustness and usability in intensive care settings.

title: Fowler Bed

title: Bed Side Screen

description: Stool with mobility for clinical work.
